text: Uthara is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Sanil Kalathil, starring Lal and Devi Ajith in the lead role. http://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/uthara.html ==Cast== * Lal * Devi Ajith * Vijayaraghavan * Bindu Ramakrishnan * Meena Ganesh * Thara Kalyan * Manikandan Pattambi * Nivia Rebin ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Uthara
